column5: This is an online delivery of the on- campus degree which you can take flexibly part time whilst you work anywhere in the world. The degree comes from University of Aberdeen and a city which is headquarters to the European oil and gas industry. Teaching comes from research expertise worldwide within the oil and gas industry.
column7: View your programme page to find out about fees  Find out about fees: abdn.ac.uk/study/international/tuition-fees-and-living-costs-287.php
column9: 5 Months or 27 Months depending on qualification
